Export.CSP:
<csr:rule name="DHCAPP.EASYUI" match="DHCAPP:EASYUI">


<csr:action>
	<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> 
	<script Language="Javascript">
	var LgGroupID="#(%session.Get("LOGON.GROUPID"))#";      //安全组ID
	var LgGroupDesc="#(%session.Get("LOGON.GROUPDESC"))#";  //安全组
	var LgUserID="#(%session.Get("LOGON.USERID"))#";        //用户ID
	var LgUserCode="#(%session.Get("LOGON.USERCODE"))#";    //用户工号
	var LgUserName="#(%session.Get("LOGON.USERNAME"))#";    //用户姓名
	var LgCtLocID="#(%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID"))#";      //科室ID
	var LgHospID="#(%session.Get("LOGON.HOSPID"))#";        //医院ID
	
   </script>
	 <SCRIPT LANGUAGE=CACHE RUNAT=SERVER>
   	   d ##class(web.DHCAPPCommonUtil).getHopDesc()
   </SCRIPT>
	<style>
	body{
		font-family:Arial,"Microsoft Yahei";
		font-size:14px;
		color:#000;
    }
    #queryForm input{margin-left:5px;margin-right:5px}/*字典*/
	/*input[type=checkbox]{
		margin-bottom:-3px;
    }*/
    input[type=radio]{
		/*margin-bottom:-8px;*/
		margin-right:5px;
    }/*间距5px*/

	.textLabel {
		margin-top: 0px;
		margin-left: 0px;
		font-size: 12px;
		text-align: right;
		background-color: #E6F1FA;
	}

	.textParent {
		margin-top: 0px;
		margin-left: 0px;
		font-size: 12px;
		text-align: left;
		background-color: #F5FAFD;
	}
	.datagrid-btn-separator {
    	height: 24px;
    	border-left: 1px solid #ccc;
    	border-right: 1px solid #fff;
    	margin: 2px 1px;
    }
    
    .tool-bar-line {
    	border-bottom: 2px solid #dddddd;
    	width:100%
	}
	form { margin-bottom:0px }    
	</style>
	<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../scripts_lib/jquery-easyui-1.3.6/themes/default/easyui.css" />
	<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../web/skin/default/css/websys.easyui.1.3.2.css" />
	<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../scripts_lib/jquery-easyui-1.3.6/themes/icon.css" />
	<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../scripts/dhcnewpro/css/icon.css"/>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts/dhcnewpro/plugins/jquery/jquery-1.8.3.min.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts_lib/jquery-easyui-1.3.6/jquery.easyui.min.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts_lib/jquery-easyui-1.3.6/locale/easyui-lang-zh_CN.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts/dhcnewpro/plugins/jquery/jquery.json.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
	<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../skin/default/css/websys.easyui.1.3.6.css"/>

    
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts/dhcnewpro/js/common.js" ></script>
	
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts/dhcnewpro/js/commonfun.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../scripts/dhcnewpro/js/component.js"></script>
	<!--hxy 2017-02-28 界面日期格式统一走配置-->
	<SCRIPT LANGUAGE=CACHE RUNAT=SERVER> 
	   d ##class(jquery.websys.EasyuiLib).WriteDateFormat()
   </SCRIPT>
    <!--改写easyui样式：../skin/default/css/websys.easyui.1.3.6.css有效则不需要-->
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../scripts/dhcnewpro/css/easyuicommon.css"/> 
	<!--<SCRIPT LANGUAGE=CACHE RUNAT=SERVER>
	d ##class(jquery.websys.EasyuiLib).Version136()
	</SCRIPT>-->
</csr:action>
</csr:rule>
